content.raw: @iche033 I only reproduce this situation with ros/urdf. If I insert pr2 model by `Insert` menu on gazebo, the direction of projector appears correctly, but when I insert pr2 by `spawn_model` node (e.g. `roslaunch pr2_gazebo pr2_empty_world.launch`), the direction and behavior when projector is on, is weird.
content.html: @iche033 I only reproduce this situation with ros/urdf. If I insert pr2 model by Insert menu on gazebo, the direction of projector appears correctly, but when I insert pr2 by spawn_model node (e.g. roslaunch pr2_gazebo pr2_empty_world.launch), the direction and behavior when projector is on, is weird.
